name: Connection: Color Fusion
description:
Connection is the new IQ test using a simple mind game. Featuring calm music and minimalist color lines, this is the game where you drag to connect the dots and create a flow free transmission. When you create a clear nexus between the dots, the lines will illuminate and glow.

Can you fill all the lines? Brain it on!

Like other Infinity Games, Connection is very simple and aims to beautify the most minimalist elements with easy-to-learn gameplay and a fusion between brain activity and soul relaxation. Concisely, the connect game creates a union line between a calm ecosystem and a connect 4 IQ test.

Can you get all pipes connected? Brain it on!

Once you start to drag and fill the first pipes, the ideas will flow free – at least on the first twenty levels – and the lines will glow transmission after transmission. It will be easy to connect the dots at start, but the difficulty will increase while you progress. It will not be so easy when you have to connect 4 color lines or illuminate split pipes. Connection creates a nexus between brain and soul: some levels will make you think, others will just beautify the moment.

The nexus between brain and soul isn’t always easy to achieve, but that fusion exists on here due a calm soundtrack, color lines that glow and a new way of IQ measuring. As you use your finger to drag and connect the dots, the lines energy will flow free and the entire transmission will illuminate when all the pipes present a perfect union.

Get your soul connected to your brain!

Unlike most of “connect 4” games, Connection creates a very calm environment and works as a brainteaser. There are no timers and the gameplay is incredibly relaxing and calm. You will feel the tension fading through your fingers while you drag to connect the dots. All you need to do is fill the line by creating a union between dots. Start connecting and see if you can create a perfect fusion. Brain it on!

The color lines will make your brain glow!

The innovative IQ test featured on Connection contributes to beautify the game as well. The rules are simple: the more lines you illuminate, higher your score. Your score updates whenever you achieve to fill a certain number of color lines. Obviously, the IQ test is not scientific. It would be edgy to create a nexus between intelligence and simple mind game, where all you need to do is connect the dots and illuminate a line.

You can store your favorite levels on your smartphone, using them later to share with your friends or to beautify your social media channels. If you prefer, just send it to us via Instagram of Facebook. We always love to connect with our players and be aware of their IQ score. We seek to build that union in all our channels!

Features:
Simple mind game: Connection is a simple mind game that will tease your brain and relax your muscles. Just drag to connect the dots and make the pipes glow!

Beautify minimalism: Enjoy the fusion of peaceful game elements! The union between the minimalist lines and the calm music will be highly appealing to your senses.

Brain it on: This game is harder than any of our previous games! To be able to illuminate the line, you will need to think. Brain it on!

Flow free & Connect 4: Reminiscent of flow free and “connect 4” games, Connection presents a unique fusion between a simple mind game and an IQ test.

Soul & Brain transmission: Free of timers, Connection creates a nexus between mind and brain, allowing you to fill the line at your own pace.
